Title: Krusty Krab Training Video
Plot: This episode is a training video for new employees of the Krusty Krab. The video goes over the basics of being an employee, such as: good hygiene, clean work area, being a good employee, and dealing with the customer. And, of course, the unforgettable POOP session.
Writer: Paul Tibbitt, C. H. Greenblatt (1), Kaz
